segments.pli: Aṅguttara Nikāya 5
segments.en: Numbered Discourses 5

segments.pli: 18. Upāsakavagga
segments.en: 18. A Lay Follower

segments.pli: 176. Pītisutta
segments.en: 176. Rapture

segments.pli: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati pañcamattehi upāsakasatehi parivuto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ bhagavā etadavoca:
segments.en: Then the householder Anāthapiṇḍika, escorted by around five hundred lay followers, went up to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down to one side. The Buddha said to him:

segments.pli: “Tumhe kho, gahapati, bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paccupaṭṭhitā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena.
segments.en: “Householders, you have supplied the mendicant Saṅgha with robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.

segments.pli: Na kho, gahapati, tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhi karaṇīyā:
segments.en: But you should not be content with just this much.

segments.pli: ‘mayaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paccupaṭṭhitā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārenā’ti.
Tasmātiha, gahapati, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ:
segments.en: So you should train like this:

segments.pli: ‘kinti mayaṃ kālena kālaṃ pavivekaṃ pītiṃ upasampajja vihareyyāmā’ti.
segments.en: ‘How can we, from time to time, enter and dwell in the rapture of seclusion?’

segments.pli: Evañhi vo, gahapati, sikkhitabban”ti.
segments.en: That’s how you should train.”

segments.pli: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
segments.en: When he said this, Venerable Sāriputta said to the Buddha,

segments.pli: “acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ, bhante.
segments.en: “It’s incredible, sir, it’s amazing!

segments.pli: Yāva subhāsitañcidaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā:
segments.en: How well said this was by the Buddha:

segments.pli: ‘tumhe kho, gahapati, bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paccupaṭṭhitā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena.
segments.en: ‘Householders, you have supplied the mendicant Saṅgha with robes, alms-food, lodgings, and medicines and supplies for the sick.

segments.pli: Na kho, gahapati, tāvatakeneva tuṭṭhi karaṇīyā—
segments.en: But you should not be content with just this much.

segments.pli: mayaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ paccupaṭṭhitā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārenāti.
Tasmātiha, gahapati, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ—
segments.en: So you should train like this:

segments.pli: kinti mayaṃ kālena kālaṃ pavivekaṃ pītiṃ upasampajja vihareyyāmāti.
segments.en: “How can we, from time to time, enter and dwell in the rapture of seclusion?”

segments.pli: Evañhi vo, gahapati, sikkhitabban’ti.
segments.en: That’s how you should train.’

segments.pli: Yasmiṃ, bhante, samaye ariyasāvako pavivekaṃ pītiṃ upasampajja viharati, pañcassa ṭhānāni tasmiṃ samaye na honti.
segments.en: At a time when a noble disciple enters and dwells in the rapture of seclusion, five things aren’t present in him.

segments.pli: Yampissa kāmūpasaṃhitaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ, tampissa tasmiṃ samaye na hoti.
segments.en: The pain and sadness connected with sensual pleasures.

segments.pli: Yampissa kāmūpasaṃhitaṃ sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, tampissa tasmiṃ samaye na hoti.
segments.en: The pleasure and happiness connected with sensual pleasures.

segments.pli: Yampissa akusalūpasaṃhitaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ, tampissa tasmiṃ samaye na hoti.
segments.en: The pain and sadness connected with the unskillful.

segments.pli: Yampissa akusalūpasaṃhitaṃ sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, tampissa tasmiṃ samaye na hoti.
segments.en: The pleasure and happiness connected with the unskillful.

segments.pli: Yampissa kusalūpasaṃhitaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ, tampissa tasmiṃ samaye na hoti.
segments.en: The pain and sadness connected with the skillful.

segments.pli: Yasmiṃ, bhante, samaye ariyasāvako pavivekaṃ pītiṃ upasampajja viharati, imānissa pañca ṭhānāni tasmiṃ samaye na hontī”ti.
segments.en: At a time when a noble disciple enters and dwells in the rapture of seclusion, these five things aren’t present in him.”

segments.pli: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta.
segments.en: “Good, good, Sāriputta!

segments.pli: Yasmiṃ, sāriputta, samaye ariyasāvako pavivekaṃ pītiṃ upasampajja viharati, pañcassa ṭhānāni tasmiṃ samaye na honti.
segments.en: At a time when a noble disciple enters and dwells in the rapture of seclusion, five things aren’t present in him.

segments.en: The pain and sadness connected with the unskillful.

segments.pli: Yampissa akusalūpasaṃhitaṃ sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, tampissa tasmiṃ samaye na hoti.
segments.en: The pleasure and happiness connected with the unskillful.

segments.en: The pain and sadness connected with the skillful.

segments.pli: Yasmiṃ, sāriputta, samaye ariyasāvako pavivekaṃ pītiṃ upasampajja viharati, imānissa pañca ṭhānāni tasmiṃ samaye na hontī”ti.
segments.en: At a time when a noble disciple enters and dwells in the rapture of seclusion, these five things aren’t present in him.”

segments.pli: Chaṭṭhaṃ.
